summary: This document is a summary of account balances and transactions for Jeffrey Epstein's account at Deutsche Bank for the month of October 2018. It details significant deposits, withdrawals, and transfers, highlighting the financial activities associated with Epstein during this period.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the primary account holder whose financial transactions are detailed in this document.

persons.name: Stewart Oldfield
persons.context: Stewart Oldfield is mentioned as a contact for personal assistance regarding the account.

persons.name: Peter Rawson
persons.context: Peter Rawson is mentioned as a recipient of a funds transfer from Epstein's account.

connections.description: Stewart Oldfield is a representative at Deutsche Bank who assists Jeffrey Epstein with his account.
Peter Rawson is a recipient of a funds transfer from Epstein's account.

events.title: Account Summary for October 2018

events.title: Outgoing Money Transfer to Bank of America

events.title: Outgoing Money Transfer to Wells Fargo
events.description: A transfer of $6,140.00 from Epstein's account to Wells Fargo.

events.title: Incoming Money Transfer from Dodson International
events.description: An incoming transfer of $572,000.00 to Epstein's account from Dodson International.

locations: 6100 Red 14ook Quarter, St. Thomas, 00802, United States
keyFacts: The document details a significant deposit of $10,000,000.00 into Jeffrey Epstein's account on October 1, 2018.
There were multiple outgoing transfers, including a $10,000,000.00 transfer to Bank of America and a $6,140.00 transfer to Wells Fargo.
The ending balance of Epstein's account as of October 31, 2018, was $790,453.14.
Stewart Oldfield is identified as a contact for personal assistance regarding the account.
Peter Rawson is mentioned as a recipient of a funds transfer from Epstein's account.
